chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
None

Goal:
forall (x y : nat) (H1 H2 : x <= y), H1 = H2

Premises:
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
utils_nat.le_pirr : forall (x y : nat) (H1 H2 : x <= y), H1 = H2
UIP_nat : forall (x y : nat) (p1 p2 : x = y), p1 = p2
UIP_dec : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall (x y : A) (p1 p2 : x = y), p1 = p2
EqdepFacts.internal_eq_rew_r_dep : forall (A : Type) (x y : A) (P : forall y0 : A, y0 = y -> Type), P y eq_refl -> forall H : x = y, P x H
measure_rect2 : forall (X Y : Type) (m : X -> Y -> nat) (P : X -> Y -> Type), (forall (x : X) (y : Y), (forall (x' : X) (y' : Y), m x' y' < m x y -> P x' y') -> P x y) -> forall (x : X) (y : Y), P x y
Nat.sqrt_up_wd = let H : Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq (Morphisms.respectful eq eq)) Nat.compare := fun (x x' : nat) (Hx : x = x') (y y' : nat) (Hy : y = y') => match Nat.compare_spec x y in (CompareSpec _ _ _ c) return (c = (x' ?= y')) with | CompEq _ _ x0 => match Nat.compare_spec x' y' in (CompareSpec _ _ _ c) return (x = y -> Eq = c) with | CompEq _ _ _ => fun _ : x = y => eq_refl | CompLt _ _ H => fun H0 : x = y => False_ind (Eq = Lt) ((fun Hx0 : y = x' => (fun Hy0 : x' = y' => (fun H1 : y' < y' => Nat.Private_OrderTac.Tac.lt_irrefl H1) (Nat.Private_OrderTac.Tac.eq_lt (Nat.Private_OrderTac...
utils_nat.nat_sinc_inj : forall (f : nat -> nat) (a b : nat), (forall x y : nat, a <= x < y /\ y <= b -> f x < f y) -> forall x y : nat, a <= x <= b -> a <= y <= b -> f x = f y -> x = y
measure_rect : forall (X : Type) (m : X -> nat) (P : X -> Type), (forall x : X, (forall y : X, m y < m x -> P y) -> P x) -> forall x : X, P x
Nat.le_stepr : forall x y z : nat, x <= y -> y = z -> x <= z
Nat.le_stepl : forall x y z : nat, x <= y -> x = z -> z <= y
utils_nat.nat_rev_ind : forall P : nat -> Prop, (forall n : nat, P (S n) -> P n) -> forall x y : nat, x <= y -> P y -> P x
Z.lt = fun x y : Z => (x ?= y)%Z = Lt : Z -> Z -> Prop Arguments Z.lt (_ _)%Z_scope
Z.le = fun x y : Z => (x ?= y)%Z <> Gt : Z -> Z -> Prop Arguments Z.le (_ _)%Z_scope
Record monoid_theory (X : Type) (m : X -> X -> X) (u : X) : Prop := mk_monoid { monoid_unit_l : forall x : X, m u x = x; monoid_unit_r : forall x : X, m x u = x; monoid_assoc : forall x y z : X, m x (m y z) = m (m x y) z } Arguments monoid_theory [X]%type_scope _%function_scope Arguments mk_monoid [X]%type_scope _%function_scope _ (_ _ _)%function_scope
Nat.divmod_spec : forall x y q u : nat, u <= y -> let (q', u') := Nat.divmod x y q u in x + S y * q + (y - u) = S y * q' + (y - u') /\ u' <= y
exist : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (x : A), P x -> {x : A | P x}
existT : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Type) (x : A), P x -> {x : A & P x}
Init.Nat.divmod = fix divmod (x y q u : nat) {struct x} : nat * nat := match x with | 0 => (q, u) | S x' => match u with | 0 => divmod x' y (S q) y | S u' => divmod x' y q u' end end : nat -> nat -> nat -> nat -> nat * nat Arguments Init.Nat.divmod (_ _ _ _)%nat_scope
BinPosDef.Pos.mul = fix mul (x y : positive) {struct x} : positive := match x with | (p~1)%positive => (y + (mul p y)~0)%positive | (p~0)%positive => ((mul p y)~0)%positive | 1%positive => y end : positive -> positive -> positive Arguments BinPosDef.Pos.mul (_ _)%positive_scope
divides_refl : forall x : nat, divides x x
Init.Nat.div = fun x y : nat => match y with | 0 => y | S y' => fst (Init.Nat.divmod x y' 0 y') end : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Init.Nat.div (_ _)%nat_scope
QArith_base.Qlt = fun x y : QArith_base.Q => (QArith_base.Qnum x * Z.pos (QArith_base.Qden y) < QArith_base.Qnum y * Z.pos (QArith_base.Qden x))%Z : QArith_base.Q -> QArith_base.Q -> Prop Arguments QArith_base.Qlt (_ _)%Q_scope
utils_nat.le_indd : forall (n : nat) (P : forall n0 : nat, n <= n0 -> Prop), P n (le_n n) -> (forall (m : nat) (l : n <= m), P m l -> P (S m) (le_S n m l)) -> forall (n0 : nat) (l : n <= n0), P n0 l
power_0 : forall x : nat, mscal Init.Nat.mul 1 0 x = 1
le_unique : forall (m n : nat) (le_mn1 le_mn2 : m <= n), le_mn1 = le_mn2
expand = fix expand (p : nat) (l : list nat) {struct l} : nat := match l with | nil => 0 | x :: l0 => x + p * expand p l0 end : nat -> list nat -> nat Arguments expand _%nat_scope _%list_scope
Init.Nat.shiftr = fun a : (fun _ : nat => nat) 0 => nat_rect (fun _ : nat => nat) a (fun _ : nat => Init.Nat.div2) : (fun _ : nat => nat) 0 -> forall n : nat, (fun _ : nat => nat) n Arguments Init.Nat.shiftr (_ _)%nat_scope
Init.Nat.shiftl = fun a : (fun _ : nat => nat) 0 => nat_rect (fun _ : nat => nat) a (fun _ : nat => Init.Nat.double) : (fun _ : nat => nat) 0 -> forall n : nat, (fun _ : nat => nat) n Arguments Init.Nat.shiftl (_ _)%nat_scope
BinPosDef.Pos.add = with add (x y : positive) {struct x} : positive := match x with | (p~1)%positive => match y with | (q~1)%positive => ((add_carry p q)~0)%positive | (q~0)%positive => ((add p q)~1)%positive | 1%positive => ((BinPosDef.Pos.succ p)~0)%positive end | (p~0)%positive => match y with | (q~1)%positive => ((add p q)~1)%positive | (q~0)%positive => ((add p q)~0)%positive | 1%positive => (p~1)%positive end | 1%positive => match y with | (q~1)%positive => ((BinPosDef.Pos.succ q)~0)%positive | (q~0)%positive => (q~1)%positive | 1%positive => 2%positive end end with add_carry (x y : positive) {struct x} : positive := match x with...
Inductive sig (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) : Type := exist : forall x : A, P x -> {x : A | P x} Arguments sig [A]%type_scope _%type_scope Arguments exist [A]%type_scope _%function_scope
